title: Submit VAT Return for Insolvent Trader
description: Submit VAT Return for Insolvent Trader

summary.title: summary
summary.description: Details of allowances, deductions and reliefs used in the calculation.

periodKey.title: periodKey
periodKey.description: The ID code for the period that this obligation belongs to. The format is a string of four alphanumeric characters. Occasionally the format includes the # symbol.

vatDueSales.title: vatDueSales
vatDueSales.description: VAT due on sales and other outputs. This corresponds to box 1 on the VAT Return form. The value must be between -9999999999999.99 and 9999999999999.99.

vatDueAcquisitions.title: vatDueAcquisitions
vatDueAcquisitions.description: VAT due in the period on acquisitions of goods made in Northern Ireland from EU Member States. This corresponds to box 2 on the VAT Return form. The value must be between -9999999999999.99 and 9999999999999.99.

totalVatDue.title: totalVatDue
totalVatDue.description: Total VAT due (the sum of vatDueSales and vatDueAcquisitions). This corresponds to box 3 on the VAT Return form. The value must be between -9999999999999.99 and 9999999999999.99.

vatReclaimedCurrPeriod.title: vatReclaimedCurrPeriod
vatReclaimedCurrPeriod.description: VAT reclaimed in the period on purchases and other inputs (including acquisitions in Northern Ireland from EU member states). This corresponds to box 4 on the VAT Return form. The value must be between -9999999999999.99 and 9999999999999.99.

netVatDue.title: netVatDue
netVatDue.description: The difference between totalVatDue and vatReclaimedCurrPeriod. This corresponds to box 5 on the VAT Return form. The value must be between 0.00 and 99999999999.99.

totalValueSalesExVAT.title: totalValueSalesExVAT
totalValueSalesExVAT.description: Total value of sales and all other outputs excluding any VAT. This corresponds to box 6 on the VAT Return form. The value must be in pounds (no pence) between -9999999999999 and 9999999999999.

totalValuePurchasesExVAT.title: totalValuePurchasesExVAT
totalValuePurchasesExVAT.description: Total value of purchases and all other inputs excluding any VAT (including exempt purchases). This corresponds to box 7 on the VAT Return form. The value must be in pounds (no pence) between -9999999999999 and 9999999999999.

totalValueGoodsSuppliedExVAT.title: totalValueGoodsSuppliedExVAT
totalValueGoodsSuppliedExVAT.description: Total value of dispatches of goods and related costs (excluding VAT) from Northern Ireland to EU Member States. This corresponds to box 8 on the VAT Return form. The value must be in pounds (no pence) between -9999999999999 and 9999999999999.

totalAcquisitionsExVAT.title: totalAcquisitionsExVAT
totalAcquisitionsExVAT.description: Total value of acquisitions of goods and related costs (excluding VAT) made in Northern Ireland from EU Member States. This corresponds to box 9 on the VAT Return form. The value must be in pounds (no pence) between -9999999999999 and 9999999999999.

uniqueId.title: uniqueId
uniqueId.description: A unique scan reference ID must be provided for an externally scanned submission.
